edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal

Class CmtElGamalCommitmentPhaseValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.elGamal.CmtElGamalCommitmentPhaseValues
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmtCommitmentPhaseValues

    public class CmtElGamalCommitmentPhaseValues
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmtCommitmentPhaseValues
    This class holds the values used by the ElGamal Committer during the commitment phase for a specific value that the committer commits about. This value is kept attached to a random value used to calculate the commitment, which is also kept together in this structure.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsymmetricCiphertext getComputedCommitment()
      Returns the value that the committer sends to the receiver in order to commit commitval in the commitment phase.
      BigIntegerRandomValue getR()
      Returns the random value used for commit the value.
      CmtCommitValue getX()
      Returns the value that the committer commits about.

      • getX

        public CmtCommitValue getX()
        Returns the value that the committer commits about.

        This value is not sent to the receiver in the commitment phase, it is sent in the decommitment phase.

        Specified by:
        getX in interface CmtCommitmentPhaseValues
        Returns:
        The value that the committer commits about.
